languages.text: {n}Помолчав, инквизитор тяжело произносит:{/n} "Не сегодня, но так мы и поступим. Пока мы попробуем обернуть ваше промедление к нашей пользе. Впереди нас ждут непростые времена, и оружие, которое способно производить данная планета, не будет лишним. Но помните, что это — лишь отсрочка приговора".

{n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, инквизитор тяжело произносит:{/n} "Не сегодня, но так мы и поступим. Пока мы попробуем обернуть ваше промедление к нашей пользе. Впереди нас ждут непростые времена, и оружие, которое способно производить данная планета, не будет лишним. Но помните, что это — лишь отсрочка приговора".

Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been delayed."

Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been delayed."

Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

{n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは少し間を置くと、重々しい声で語る。{/n}「それが我々の取るべき行動だが、今日はその時ではない。ひとまずは、お前の逡巡を異端審問庁の利益にして手を打とう。試練の時は目前だ。この惑星が生産可能な武器は役立つだろう。だが覚えておけ、判決が単に延期されたに過ぎないことを忘れるな」
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは少し間を置くと、重々しい声で語る。{/n}「それが我々の取るべき行動だが、今日はその時ではない。ひとまずは、お前の逡巡を異端審問庁の利益にして手を打とう。試練の時は目前だ。この惑星が生産可能な武器は役立つだろう。だが覚えておけ、判決が単に延期されたに過ぎないことを忘れるな」

languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

languages.text: {n}他顿了顿，随后以低沉的声音继续开了口。{/n}“我们之后会这么做的，但现在并不急。至于现在，我们要将你的姑息化为我们的优势。目前情势危急，我们需要充分利用这颗行星生产的一切武器。不过你要记住，你的判决只是延期，并非赦免。”
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}他顿了顿，随后以低沉的声音继续开了口。{/n}“我们之后会这么做的，但现在并不急。至于现在，我们要将你的姑息化为我们的优势。目前情势危急，我们需要充分利用这颗行星生产的一切武器。不过你要记住，你的判决只是延期，并非赦免。”

languages.text: {n}Hace una breve pausa y continúa sombríamente:{/n} «Es lo que haremos, pero todavía no. Por ahora, intentaremos convertir su titubeo en oportunidad. Nos esperan momentos difíciles y las armas que el planeta puede producir nos resultarán útiles. Pero recuerde que la sentencia ha sido pospuesta, no anulada».
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hace una breve pausa y continúa sombríamente:{/n} «Es lo que haremos, pero todavía no. Por ahora, intentaremos convertir su titubeo en oportunidad. Nos esperan momentos difíciles y las armas que el planeta puede producir nos resultarán útiles. Pero recuerde que la sentencia ha sido pospuesta, no anulada».

languages.text: {n}Il reste silencieux un moment, puis reprend d'une voix grave :{/n} « Nous y viendrons, mais pas aujourd'hui. Pour le moment, nous allons tirer avantage de votre hésitation. De rudes épreuves nous attendent, et les armes produites par cette planète nous seront particulièrement utiles pour les affronter. Mais gardez à l'esprit que la sentence n'est que reportée, pas annulée. »
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il reste silencieux un moment, puis reprend d'une voix grave :{/n} « Nous y viendrons, mais pas aujourd'hui. Pour le moment, nous allons tirer avantage de votre hésitation. De rudes épreuves nous attendent, et les armes produites par cette planète nous seront particulièrement utiles pour les affronter. Mais gardez à l'esprit que la sentence n'est que reportée, pas annulée. »

languages.text: {n}Er macht eine kurze Pause und sagt dann mit bedeutungsschwerer Stimme:{/n} "Das werden wir auch tun, aber nicht heute. Jetzt werden wir versuchen, Euer Zögern zu unserem Vorteil auszunutzen. Vor uns liegen schwere Zeiten, und wir könnten die Waffen gebrauchen, die dieser Planet herstellen kann. Aber denkt daran, dass die Strafe lediglich aufgeschoben ist."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er macht eine kurze Pause und sagt dann mit bedeutungsschwerer Stimme:{/n} "Das werden wir auch tun, aber nicht heute. Jetzt werden wir versuchen, Euer Zögern zu unserem Vorteil auszunutzen. Vor uns liegen schwere Zeiten, und wir könnten die Waffen gebrauchen, die dieser Planet herstellen kann. Aber denkt daran, dass die Strafe lediglich aufgeschoben ist."

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir süre duraksıyor, ardından ağır ağır konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Tam olarak yapacağımız şey de bu olacak ancak bugün değil. Şimdilik tereddüdünü avantajımıza çevirmeye çalışmalıyız. Zor günler bizi bekliyor. Hâliyle bu gezegenin üretmeye muktedir olduğu silahlar işimize yarayabilir. Yalnız cezanın yalnızca ertelendiğini aklından çıkarma."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses for a short while, then says in a heavy voice,{/n} "That is what we will do, but not today. For now, we will try to turn your hesitation to our advantage. Trying times lie ahead of us, and we could use the weapons that this planet is capable of producing. But remember that the sentence has merely been postponed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir süre duraksıyor, ardından ağır ağır konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Tam olarak yapacağımız şey de bu olacak ancak bugün değil. Şimdilik tereddüdünü avantajımıza çevirmeye çalışmalıyız. Önümüzde zor zamanlar var ve bu gezegenin üretmeye muktedir olduğu silahlar işimize yarayabilir ancak cezanın yalnızca ertelendiğini aklından çıkarma."
